channel.description: The mailserver suite with the 'moo' – 🐮 + 🐋 = 💕 | Official Blog Page

item.title: 💪🐮6️⃣4️⃣ mailcow: dockerized (ARM64) is now in open Beta (inside nightly builds)
item.author: Niklas Meyer/DerLinkman
item.description:
Moohoo everyone!

No you are not dreaming, yes you are awake and no this is no joke:

mailcow’s ARM64 support can now be tested in nightly as BETA!
